line.name: Julia
line.text: I don't want to talk to that person.

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: Have you seen my favorite eraser?

line.name: Julia
line.text: Favorite eraser?

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: I think that rascal Joe stole it again.

line.name: Julia
line.text: I can help. Where is it?

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: It's in one of the other rooms.

line.name: Julia
line.text: Why do you have a favorite eraser?

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: That eraser has a lot of sentimental value to me.

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: In fact, I'll tell you a story.

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: Back in 1972..

line.name: Julia
line.text: Ooh, look at the time. Gotta go.

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: I'm not resting until I've found my eraser.

line.name: Joe
line.text: Heh.. he'll never find it.

line.name: Julia
line.text: Did you take Mr. Sanders' eraser?

line.name: Joe
line.text: Fine, take it.

line.name: Joe
line.text: I'll take it again tomorrow anyways.

line.name: Julia
line.text: Hey Joe.

line.name: Julia
line.text: Hey, do you have my prom poster?

line.name: Jordan
line.text: I was too lazy to get poster materials.

line.name: Jordan
line.text: But anyhow...

line.name: Jordan
line.text: Would you still like to go to prom with me?

line.name: Jordan
line.text: The end.

line.name: Jordan
line.text: Well, this is awkward.

line.name: Jordan
line.text: What do I do now?

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: You've found my eraser?

line.name: Mr. Sanders
line.text: Er.. Could you give it to me?
